title: Tim Cook says AI, machine learning are part of ‘virtually every product’ Apple is building
description:
In a recent quarterly earnings call on Aug. 3, Apple CEO Tim Cook emphasized the company’s extensive use of artificial intelligence (AI), a technology dramatically reshaping the tech industry. Cook said during a question-and-answer session: “If you take a step back, we view AI and machine learning as core fundamental technologies that are integral to […]

The post Tim Cook says AI, machine learning are part of ‘virtually every product’ Apple is building appeared first on CryptoSlate.
